name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: To be fair, I don't think there's exactly a good way to judge people.     Judging individual actions and personalities at that specific point in time, sure, that can be done.     But a person in the long-run? Good luck.

source_obj.text: To be fair, I don't think there's exactly a good way to judge people.     Judging individual actions and personalities at that specific point in time, sure, that can be done.     But a person in the long-run? Good luck.
